about_the_game:
Nine songs from "Romance of the Three Kingdoms 12" will be added.

▼Additional BGM
Wei Theme/ Shu Theme/Wu Theme/Lu Bu Theme/Lord's Theme/Life or Death/Confrontations/A Moment of Quiet/Beyond the Fighting

▼To Use
Use "Change BGM" in "Settings" to change the music to songs from "Romance of the Three Kingdoms 12."
detailed_description:
Nine songs from "Romance of the Three Kingdoms 12" will be added.

▼Additional BGM
Wei Theme/ Shu Theme/Wu Theme/Lu Bu Theme/Lord's Theme/Life or Death/Confrontations/A Moment of Quiet/Beyond the Fighting

▼To Use
Use "Change BGM" in "Settings" to change the music to songs from "Romance of the Three Kingdoms 12."

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 10, Windows® 8, Windows® 8.1, Windows® 7, Windows® Vista
  • Processor: Pentium®4 1.6GHz or over
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024×768 over or 1280×720 over display
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 48KHz WAVE file can be played
  • Additional Notes: Shader model: Version 3.0, VRAM: 256MB over
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows® 10, Windows® 8, Windows® 8.1, Windows® 7, Windows® Vista
  • Processor: Core2 Duo 2.0GHz or over
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024×768 over or 1280×720 over display
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 48KHz WAVE file can be played
  • Additional Notes: Shader model: Version 3.0, VRAM: 512MB over
